package.name: NewsletterPopup
package.summary: This is magento extension for newsletter subscription with pop-up window.
package.description:
Magento extension of newsletter subscription for latest version (1.9)
When user visit the website this pop-up window open for newsletter subscription. Its easy to install and configure.
if visitor don’t want to subscribe them, then its easily close.
you can easily change the layout of this pop-up as per your requirement.
you can see newsletter subscriber list on admin panel newsletter section.
package.notes: this is stable version of newsletter pop-up subscription.
